stimulusHtml: Suppose that a firm is producing the profit-maximizing output under conditions of diminishing returns. Its output price is $25, and its marginal cost of production at its current output level is $25. Based on this information, it can be concluded that this firm must
choicesHtml: decrease its output to maximize profit it it is a monopoly
increase its output to maximize profit if it is a monopoly
exit the industry if it is a perfectly competitive firm
